nasamarsfarmerswanted


agritecture:

Be A Martian! Farmers Wanted by NASA for Mars Colony

Our friends at Heliospectra posted this on LinkedIn today and mentioned the only thing missing from this recruiting poster are the LEDs! Its been a big week for Mars exploration with the live Space-X keynote by Elon Musk and the revelation of bold plans to terraform Mars. Controlled Environment Agriculture will play a major role, creating yet another reason to invest in your abilities to grow food hydroponically indoors. Do you have what it takes?

Mars needs YOU! In the future, Mars will need all kinds of explorers, farmers, surveyors, teachers … but most of all YOU! Join us on the Journey to Mars as we explore with robots and send humans there one day. Download a Mars poster that speaks to you. Be an explorer!

SOURCE

03/10/2016
